remarks: Value of a function given in maps-to notation, with a slightly different sethood condition.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
statement:
fvmpt3.a $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fvmpt3.b $e |- F = ( x e. D |-> B ) $.
fvmpt3.c $e |- ( x e. D -> B e. V ) $.
fvmpt3 $p |- ( A e. D -> ( F ` A ) = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d V x $.
